maritime 0.0.9
  • Reference

Decode NMEA Messages

Source: R/ais_decode.R
ais_decode_nmea.Rd

National Marine Electronics Association (NMEA) messages are comma separated value lines of text that start with sender or "talker" code and the sentence type.

ais_decode_nmea(
  msgs,
  data_type = c("auto", "file", "strings", "text"),
  as_df = maritime_as_df(),
  as_sf = maritime_as_sf(),
  as_tibble = maritime_as_tibble(),
  verbose = maritime_verbose()
)

Arguments

msgs

character()

  • NMEA messages
data_type

character(1L)

  • how to interpret x.

    • one of "auto", "file", "strings", or "text"

      • "auto": let ais_decode() decide

      • "file": treat x as a file path

      • "strings": treat x as a vector with each element containing a single AIS message

      • "text": treat x as a single character containing multiple AIS messages
as_df

logical(1L), default: maritime_as_df()

  • Whether the parsed content should be transformed to a data frame.

  • maritime_as_df() defaults to TRUE.
as_sf

logical(1L), default: maritime_as_sf()

  • Whether an sf (sf::st_sf()) should be returned.

  • Ignored if the {sf} package is not installed.

  • maritime_as_sf() defaults to TRUE.
as_tibble

logical(1L), default: maritime_as_tibble()

  • Whether a tibble::tibble() should be returned.

  • Ignored if the {tibble} package is not installed.

  • maritime_as_tibble() defaults to TRUE.
verbose

logical(1L), default: maritime_verbose()

  • Whether print status and diagnostic messages.

  • maritime_verbose() defaults to TRUE.

Details

ais_decode_nmea decodes NMEA messages (currently 1, 2, and 3) contained in files or character vectors.

Examples

nmea_file <- example_nmea_file()
nmea_lines <- readLines(nmea_file, warn = FALSE)

nmea_lines[1:10]
#>  [1] "!AIVDM,1,1,,A,13u?etPv2;0n:dDPwUM1U1Cb069D,0*23"                                            
#>  [2] ",1541030400"                                                                                
#>  [3] ",1541030400"                                                                                
#>  [4] "!ABVDM,1,1,7,B,H3uJVD4NDBE5847C62ppnk0@6120,0*4F,1541030311,1541030400"                     
#>  [5] "!BSVDM,2,1,9,A,53KPtl01pv8`tTtR22050thhtr2222222222220l1`A916Vh0;20DPSmD`0D,0*21,1541030311"
#>  [6] "!BSVDM,2,2,9,A,ljDm0CPiH80,2*21,1541030311,1541030400"                                      
#>  [7] "!BSVDM,1,1,,B,147lQH00001f>MtQtr3a92nr00Sa,0*0B,1541030311,1541030400"                      
#>  [8] "!AIVDM,1,1,0,A,H4eG>Gh5@h4q@T>1<uDp@000000,2*25,1541030311,1541030400"                      
#>  [9] "!AIVDM,1,1,,A,33e3Dn500012NAtDR:WV5H<r0E0r,0*0E,1541030311,1541030400"                      
#> [10] "!BSVDM,1,1,,A,H3n2?6Q=H4pDr22222222222220,2*47,1541030311,1541030400"                       

# decoding a file =====================================================================
ais_decode_nmea(nmea_file)
